mapper.select: SELECT SELF_NO, RESUME_NO, SELF_NAME, SELF_CONTENT FROM SELF_INFO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELF_INFO(SELF_NO, RESUME_NO, SELF_NAME, SELF_CONTENT) VALUES (( SELECT NVL(MAX(SELF_NO), 0) +1 FROM SELF_INFO ), ( SELECT NVL(MAX(RESUME_NO), 0) +1 FROM SELF_INFO ), #{self_name}, #{self_content})
mapper.select: SELECT R.*, S.* FROM RESUME R, SELF_INFO S WHERE R.RESUME_NO = S.RESUME_NO AND R.RESUME_NO = #{resume_no}
